s_synopsis: The year is 2029 and an alien invasion, led by Supreme Commander Vile Malmort, threatens the earth. He has destroyed the city of New York and built a device known as an "Astrotube", which connects the ruins of the city with his alien space station. If this invasion does not stop, humanity will surely be doomed! A duo of cyborg soldiers have been assigned to combat the invading forces, known as "S.C.A.T." The fate of mankind rests on the success of their five-stage mission.
